turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to get some coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, which store will you pick this up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will be in Bartlett in five minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, there are three locations in that city.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will be close to the route 59 and Army Trail Road location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, I will order from the 59 and Army Trail Road. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I just need a Caffè Misto.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What are the choices?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Almond, coconut, 2 percent, whole, low-fat and soy

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please give me Almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, will this be served warm or cold?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like it warm.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, is there anythign else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that will be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, your coffee will be ready in five minutes at the Route 59 and Army Trail location in Bartlett.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
